name: suitest-js-api-cucumber-demo
description: An example of Suitest <-> Cucumber integration

scripts.interactive:home: suitest interactive cucumber-js --tags \"@e2e and @home\" -f json:report/cucumber_report.json -f summary
scripts.interactive:video: suitest interactive cucumber-js --tags \"@e2e and @video\" -f json:report/cucumber_report.json -f summary
scripts.interactive:image: suitest interactive cucumber-js --tags \"@e2e and @image\" -f json:report/cucumber_report.json -f summary
scripts.interactive:category: suitest interactive cucumber-js --tags \"@e2e and @category\" -f json:report/cucumber_report.json -f summary
